articles.description: Even on what would have to be considered a good day overall for Chicago Bears quarterback Mitch Trubisky, his decision-making was compared to that of an inexperienced teenager. So, you know, not perfect.

articles.title: What to watch for when Arizona basketball hosts Colorado on Monday - Arizona Desert Swarm
articles.description: After a brief Christmas break, the Arizona Wildcats (6-1, 0-1 Pac-12) return to the court Monday when they host the Colorado Buffaloes (6-1, 1-0 Pac-12) at 7:30 p.m. MST on the Pac-12 Network. This...
articles.content:
